org.apache.river.test.spec.loader.pref

Class AbstractTestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.QATestEnvironment
      • org.apache.river.test.spec.loader.pref.AbstractTestBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Test, TestEnvironment
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Constructor, GetClassAnnotation, GetClassAnnotation, GetClassLoader, GetClassLoaderMalformedURLException, GetClassLoaderSecurityException, GetPermissions, GetResources, IsPreferredClass, IsPreferredResource, IsPreferredResourceIOException, LoadClasses, LoadClasses, LoadClasses, LoadClassesClassNotFoundException, LoadClassesMalformedURLException, LoadClassesSecurityException, LoadClassesSecurityException, LoadProxyClasses, LoadProxyClassesClassNotFoundException, LoadProxyClassesMalformedURLException, NewInstance

    public abstract class AbstractTestBase
extends QATestEnvironment
implements Test
    This class is base class for all org.apache.river.test.spec.loader.pref tests. This class sets up the testing environment and has some helper methods.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String annotation
      String to define the exportAnnotation string that will be passed to QATestPreferredClassLoader constructor.
      protected int auxPort
      Auxiliary http port to download preferred classes and resources

      String codebase for QATestPreferredClassProvider.

      The QAConfig object

      Flag to define boolean requireDlPerm argument that will be passed to QATestPreferredClassLoader constructor.

      Flag to indicate that SecurityException should be thrown.
      protected static String INVCODEBASE
      Default invalid codebase
      protected boolean isHttp
      Flag to define whether http or file url will be used for download preferred classes and resources

      The instrumented preferred class loader QATestPreferredClassLoader
      protected int port
      Http port to download preferred classes and resources via org.apache.river.qa.port

      The name of java.rmi.server.codebase system property

    • Method Detail

      • construct

        public Test construct(QAConfig config)
               throws Exception
        Sets up the testing environment.
        Specified by:
        construct in interface TestEnvironment
        Overrides:
        construct in class QATestEnvironment
        Parameters:
        config - QAConfig from the runner for construct.
        Returns:
        Test to run.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any failure occurs during construct

      • createLoader

        protected void createLoader(String jar,
                            String jar2)
                     throws TestException
        Create QATestPreferredClassLoader to support loader.pref's testing.
        Obtain all parameters passing to PreferredClassLoader constructor, then create QATestPreferredClassLoader.
        Parameters may be defined in the property file or may be defined by the individual test.
        Parameters:
        jar - name of jar file to download preferred classes/resources.
        jar2 - (optional) name of (second) jar file to download preferred classes/resources
        Throws:
        TestException - if could not create QATestPreferredClassLoader

      • createLoader

        protected void createLoader(String jar)
                     throws TestException
        Create QATestPreferredClassLoader with an url to a single jar file. See createLoader(String jar, String jar2)
        Throws:
        TestException - if could not create QATestPreferredClassLoader

      • expectedAnnotationString

        protected String expectedAnnotationString()
                                   throws TestException
        Returns expected string annotation for class loader
        Throws:
        TestException - if could not create QATestPreferredClassLoader object

      • obtainMalformedCodebase

        protected String obtainMalformedCodebase()
                                  throws TestException
        Obtain malformed codebase from codebaseParam that should be set to malformed codebase or to null. If codebaseParam is null then reset java.rmi.server.codebase to invalid codebase.
        Returns:
        malformed codebase or null
        Throws:
        TestException - if could not create QATestPreferredClassLoader object
